Posts.Content: Jun 3, 2015 06:18PM Judi1952 wrote: Stage IV since Oct, 2012. Mets to stomach, peritoneum, colon, bladder, omentum. Currently starting Xeloda. Have taken Faslodex, Avastin in the past. I was originally given 2 mos to 2 years to live. I am proving them wrong. Life is beautiful.
Posts.Title: How long have you been Stage IV? goldie0827 dormouse

Posts.Content: Jan 24, 2013 05:43PM Judi1952 wrote: I have mets to the stomach, colon and peritineum lining.  I did 3 rounds of chemo which alleviated my stomach pain and intestinal discomfort,  My ascities also decreased considerably.  My med onc seems to think that treating me with Arimidex and Faslodex may help at least keep things stable.  It's only been a week.  Will reevaluate in 3 mos.  My doc seems pretty hopeful I can survive.  Me. too!
